code: export var setCookie=function setCookie(cname,cvalue,ext){var d=new Date();d.setTime(d.getTime()+ext);var expires="expires="+d.toUTCString();document.cookie=cname+"="+cvalue+";"+expires+";path=/";};export var getCookie=function getCookie(cname){var name=cname+"=";var decodedCookie=decodeURIComponent(document.cookie);var ca=decodedCookie.split(';');for(var i=0;i<ca.length;i++){var c=ca[i];while(c.charAt(0)==' '){c=c.substring(1);}if(c.indexOf(name)==0){return c.substring(name.length,c.length);}}return"";};
